mapper.select: select product_id, title, subTitle, price, detail, sale, product_img s.category_name as category_name, s.subcategory_id as subcategory_id, subcategory_name from subCategory s, product p where s.subCategory_id = p.subCategory_id
mapper.insert: insert into product(subCategory_id, title, subTitle, price, detail, sale, product_img) values(#{subCategory.subCategory_id},#{title},#{subTitle},#{price},#{detail},#{sale},#{product_img})
